snippet.title: Rez Infinite PC (Steam) Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Rez Infinite now available on Steam (PC, HTC VIVE, Oculus) and Oculus stores! Playable on your desktop or in fully immersive VR.

Steam Store: http://store.steampowered.com/app/636450/

Oculus Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1099633596804669/
